attributes.action: PROTECT OUR CHILDREN - FORCE NEWS MEDIA TO ADHERE TO "U" RATINGS WHEN PRINTING THEIR FRONT PAGES
attributes.additional_details:
Please protect our children, and stop newspapers and magazines from printing graphic and age inappropriate pictures and titles on their FRONT PAGES.

We demand to see an enforced LAW to prevent newspapers or magazines printing material on their front pages that is inappropriate or disturbing to children, who may see them INVOLUNTARILY on the front pages of newspapers and magazines when they are on display.
